WizardTD

Class Mana

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Mana

  • public class Mana
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the mana system in the WizardTD game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Decreases the current mana by a specified amount.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mana

        public Mana(float initial_mana,
            float initial_mana_cap,
            float initial_mana_gained_per_second,
            float mana_pool_spell_initial_cost,
            float mana_pool_spell_cost_increase_per_use,
            float mana_pool_spell_cap_multiplier,
            float mana_pool_spell_mana_gained_multiplier)
        Constructor for the Mana class.
        Parameters:
        initial_mana - Initial amount of mana.
        initial_mana_cap - Maximum amount of mana that can be held.
        initial_mana_gained_per_second - Amount of mana gained per second.
        mana_pool_spell_initial_cost - Initial cost of the mana pool spell.
        mana_pool_spell_cost_increase_per_use - Increase in cost of the mana pool spell with each use.
        mana_pool_spell_cap_multiplier - Multiplier for the mana cap when the mana pool spell is used.
        mana_pool_spell_mana_gained_multiplier - Multiplier for the mana gained when the mana pool spell is used.
